extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Radiogenic Isotope Analysis in isotope analysis and Arc Reactor in Iron Man have mathematical modeling
extended_metaphor.radiogenic_isotope_analysis: Radiogenic Isotope Analysis in isotope analysis involves utilizing mathematical models to calculate the time since the radioactive decay process began, providing insights into the age and history of geological samples.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: Similarly, the Arc Reactor in Iron Man functions as a complex power source that relies on precise mathematical calculations to generate clean energy and power the Iron Man suit, showcasing the connection between mathematics and advanced technology in both contexts.

extended_metaphor.metaphor: both Radiogenic Isotope Analysis in isotope analysis and Arc Reactor in Iron Man have precision engineering
extended_metaphor.radiogenic_isotope_analysis: Within Radiogenic Isotope Analysis, precision engineering plays a critical role in offering accurate age estimates and tracing the origins of various materials with high levels of certainty and detail.
extended_metaphor.arc_reactor: In the case of the Arc Reactor, precision engineering is essential for ensuring the efficient and safe operation of the energy source, underscoring the importance of meticulous design and execution in both scientific and fictional technological advancements.
